description: RouteIngress holds information about the places where a route is exposed.

routerName.description: Name is a name chosen by the router to identify itself; this value is required

host.description: Host is the host string under which the route is exposed; this value is required

routerCanonicalHostname.description: CanonicalHostname is the external host name for the router that can be used as a CNAME for the host requested for this route. This value is optional and may not be set in all cases.

conditions.description: Conditions is the state of the route, may be empty.

wildcardPolicy.description: Wildcard policy is the wildcard policy that was allowed where this route is exposed.
